headline.main: VAST BRITISH AID TO GO TO CAUCASUS; Wavell Prepares for Joint Command With Russians to Meet German Drive

lead_paragraph: ANKARA, Turkey, Oct. 20 -- General Sir Archibald P. Wavell, Commander of the British forces in India, has intensified his vast preparations for a joint Anglo-Russian Caucasian command, coincident with the collapse of Odessa and the beginning of a new German drive upon Rostov and the Caucasus, according to information circulating in foreign military circles here.
abstract: Wavell prepares for joint command with USSR to meet possible German Caucasus drive; situation discussed

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
